author: StingyJack
body:
There are many times where I've had to go manually craft an `<a href="....` as a new property where the existing string property already had a valid URL in it, just so ConvertTo-Html would generate a hyperlink. 

Its non-intuitive for something that creates HTML to be unable to recognize url's and emit hyperlinks, It doesnt have to be a default action, but it would save the time and trouble of hand building `<a href` strings

comments.author: jackdcasey
comments.body:
I think this would be a nice option as a switch! Something like `-createhyperlinks` but maybe a bit more concise. 

What do you guys think? 

I'd be happy to play around with this!

title: Feature Request - ConvertTo-Html should auto create hyperlinks
